refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
oid_format
constants
SNMP_OID_OUTPUT_FULLThe complete form like "iso.org.dod...."
SNMP_OID_OUTPUT_NUMERICThe numeric form like ".1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.3.2.10"
SNMP_OID_OUTPUT_MODULEThe short form like "NET-SNMP-TC::linux"
SNMP_OID_OUTPUT_SUFFIX
SNMP_OID_OUTPUT_UCD
SNMP_OID_OUTPUT_NONE
The last four constants are expected to be added in PHP 5.3.6 as of bug #53862.

&reftitle.notes;
snmp_set_oid_output_format is only available when using the UCD SNMP library. This function is not available when using the Windows SNMP library.
